name: One Day in the Rain City "BOGOR"
description:
Bogor is a city on the island of Java in the West Java province of Indonesia. It bears the nickname "the Rain City" (Kota Hujan), because of frequent rain showers. It nearly always rain even during the dry season. The city has a presidential palace and a botanical garden (Kebun Raya Bogor) – one of the oldest and largest in the world. 

With the cooling climate, beautiful flower beds and harmless animals, the land is an ideal destination to escape from the heat of the city.
